title: None Shall Escape [1944 - USA] World War II drama
description:
None Shall Escape (1944 - USA)

Drama / War
 
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0037136/


Nominated for 1 Oscar - Best Writing

German military officer Wilhelm Grimm is tried for crimes committed during the Second World War and his life and career is shown in a series of flashbacks. Grimm returns seriously injured and disenchanted from the Great War to a village on the German-Polish border, his subsequent actions caused him banishment from the community and he becomes attracted to the Nazi Party. The movie is staggering in its prescience. It is so on the money that it is actually hard to believe it wasn't made ten years after the end of the Second World War.


Video: XviD, 640x480, 23.976 fps, 1388 Kbps, 01h25m46s
Audio: MP3, 48000 Hz, mono, 60 kbps

SATRip, English audio, optional subtitles Portuguese-Brazil and Spanish
